steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Locate the text box you want to edit.
Click inside the text box to activate it.
Make the desired changes to the text in the text box.
To format the text, select the text and use the formatting options in the toolbar.
To resize the text box, click and drag the handles on the sides or corners of the box.
To move the text box, click and drag it to the desired location on the document.
Save the changes to the document.
